started: {emotes.loading} | First, provide the ID of the message
noId: {emotes.error} | This is not a valid ID, action canceled
giveRole: {emotes.loading} | Now mention the role or send its ID
noRole: {emotes.error} | This is not a valid role, action canceled
giveEmote: {emotes.loading} | Now, send the emote you want
noEmote: {emotes.error} | This is not a valid emoji, action canceled
created: {emotes.success} | The reaction role has been created
